module.name: Voicemail
module.changelog: *15.0.18.49* FREEI-4308 UCP VM widget loosing VM after moving them *15.0.18.48* FREEPBX-23172 Added new field 'voicemails' to getStaticSettings function *15.0.18.47* FREEPBX-23065 Forward VM broken in VM UCP Widget *15.0.18.46* FREEI-4033 Configuring voicemail to email *15.0.18.45* FREEI-4033 Configuring voicemail to email *15.0.18.44* FREEI-4033 Configuring voicemail to email *15.0.18.43* FREEI-4033 Added condition to replace 'AMPWEBADDRESS' value, if it exists in advance settings *15.0.18.42* Packaging of ver 15.0.18.42 *15.0.18.41* FREEI-1520 External notify field not being populated automatically in Voicemail admin *15.0.18.40* SCD-25 method to generate symlink for a voicemail file and return a link to access it *15.0.18.39* FREEI-2107 patch the security issue *15.0.18.38* set Default options for voicemail if Optional params are not sent *15.0.18.37* FREEI-3702 UCP-QA - VM, CEL widgets are missing for V165 *15.0.18.36* Fix `resolveInputNames` incorrect handling of variables: `saycid`, `envelope`, `attach`, and `delete` *15.0.18.35* FREEI-3445 add method to call from userman to update the VM widget user details *15.0.18.34* FREEPBX-20666 UCP voice mails can't be move while UCP is in frensh *15.0.18.33* FREEI-3253 Restore of VM greetings is not copying it's data on restore *15.0.18.32* FREEPBX-22075 voicemail backup *15.0.18.31* FREEI-22444 voicemail not playing when having more than one voicemail *15.0.18.30* FREEPBX-22444 bug fixed for voicemail not playing in ucp *15.0.18.29* FREEPBX-22075 Added Voicemail functionality in Backup *15.0.18.28* FREEI-2982 *15.0.18.27* FREEI-2991 bug fix for description no given for few parameters *15.0.18.26* FREEPBX-22221 UCP high server CPU and browser usage related to Voicemail *15.0.18.25* FREEI-2856 Voicemail App - Voicemail Messages not showing properly *15.0.18.24* FREEI-2791 added playVoicemailMessage method for dphone API *15.0.18.23* FREEI-2780 Added getMessagesCountByExtensionPath method for Dphone API *15.0.18.22* FREEI-2741 Added checkVoicemailMessagesPath method for Dphone API *15.0.18.21* Packaging of ver 15.0.18.21 *15.0.18.20* Packaging of ver 15.0.18.20 *15.0.18.19* FREEI-1542 Constant VM Notifications when logged into UCP *15.0.18.18* Packaging of ver 15.0.18.18 *15.0.18.17* Packaging of ver 15.0.18.17 *15.0.18.16* Packaging of ver 15.0.18.16 *15.0.18.15* bump *15.0.18.14* FREEI-1656 UCP throwing AJAX error *15.0.18.13* FREEPBX-21342 Backup/Restore missing Voicemail Admin data *15.0.18.12* FREEPBX-21036 Bulk Import Extensions failure when voicemail_enable = yes *15.0.18.11* FREEI-961 fixe some issue for refresh table *15.0.18.10* FREEI-961 voicemail behavior in UCP. Refresh issue *15.0.18.9* FREEI-752 Something is corrupting voicemail.conf *15.0.18.8* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.18.7* FREEPBX-20460 *15.0.18.6* FREEPBX-20385 module.description: This module allows you to configure Voicemail for a user or extension
